attributes.review: just opened this app and had a heart❤️ attack💥Trump looks like someone who would kick🦵🏾all the homeless ❌🏠people. He probably smells like cheese🧀 to. this app is trash 🗑 and needs to be taken down. It gives me diabetes 🍬. thank you

attributes.review: I went to use it and it immediately took me to a site that had very inappropriate things on it. A couple days later I get a notification from the app that says “HOT BABES IN YOUR AREA” Needless to say I’m very disappointed with this app.

attributes.review: this app made me queasy. after the feeling of queasiness, it made me vomit all over the cheeto man on the not-so-welcome “welcome” screen. the app is unreliable just like its creator and quite frankly, i don’t appreciate that. MAKE the APPSTORE GREAT AGAIN by deleting this app off of it :))) thanks🤠
attributes.title: Dysfunctional and UNRELIABLE.

attributes.review: As soon as i downloaded the app, my phone powered off and most of my apps got deleted. This is a new iphone 11 so it wasn't my phone's fault. This app is horrible. If you download it your phone will mess up.

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support my president. i come home and my dog is DEAD and none other than a note from the man himself was next to him. then note said that DONALD TRUMP killed my dog. i cried😔😭💔. i wish i could give this app zero stars 😡✨😳.
attributes.title: this app KILLED my dog
